title: Original Pixel phone extremely slow
content:
Last week my original Pixel phone became unusable. It will work great for about 30 seconds then completely lock up for about 2 minutes.  

Everything I do it ends up with the "Android XXX is not responding" Close or wait.

I get that for System UI and everything else. I've done a couple of factory resets on this, but have no idea what would cause the performance to get to the point it's unusable.
